channel.title: Slayer problem
channel.description: Well i recently added slayer to my server but when i player kills a npc (in slayer like a crawling hand or abyssal) they get kick out of the server everytime , but admins dont have that problem they kill them and the server dont kick them i wanna fix that so players wont get kicked out of the server .. does any one know what could be wrong? thank you

Nice thank you very much guys that was it

item.title: Slayer problem
item.dc:creator: @killer_2008 killer_2008
item.description:
@killer_2008 wrote:

Sure these are the codes that i made for NpcHandler.java
o and i found out something they get kick out when they get the xp the admins already have 99 and dont get xp thats why dont get kick out =\

[code]if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2035) { //Spiders
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(3000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(3000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1619) { //Bloodvelds
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { //Abyssal Demon
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 49) { //Hellbounds
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(7000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(7000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625) { //Smoke Devil
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1655) { //crawling hand
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18);
}
}[/code]

OH and this are the codes in client.java

[code] case 72: //Click to attack
if(attacknpc > 0) {
sendMessage(“You are already attacking an npc!”);
}
else {
attacknpc = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
boolean Cant = false;
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].attacknpc > 0) {
Cant = true;
sendMessage(“You can’t attack a dueling npc!”);
}
boolean slayer = true;
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1619)
{
if(playerLevel[18] >= 29){slayer = true;} else{slayer = false; sendMessage(“You need a slayer level of 30 to slay Bloodvelds.”);}
}
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1615)
{
if(playerLevel[18] >= 69){slayer = true;} else{slayer = false; sendMessage(“You need a slayer level of 70 to slay Abyssal Demons.”);}
}
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1625)
{
if(playerLevel[18] >= 74){slayer = true;} else{slayer = false; sendMessage(“You need a slayer level of 75 to slay Smoke Devils.”);}
}
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 2035)
{
if(playerLevel[18] >= 64){slayer = true;} else{slayer = false; sendMessage(“You need a slayer level of 65 to slay Crypt Spyders.”);}
}
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 49)
{
if(playerLevel[18] >= 89){slayer = true;} else{slayer = false; sendMessage(“You need a slayer level of 90 to slay Hellbounds.”);}
}
if (attacknpc >= 0 && attacknpc < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs && slayer == true && server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc] != null && !Cant) {

if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer < 1 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer == playerId || inwildy2 == true) {
IsAttackingNPC = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].StartKilling = playerId;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].RandomWalk = false;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsUnderAttack = true;
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX != absX && server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY != absY)
faceNPC(attacknpc);
}
else {
sendMessage(“This brother is already under attack.”);
} } else {
sendMessage(“Train more dont be lazy =).”);
ResetAttackNPC();
}
}
break;[/code]

Read full topic
